TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ImageClickEventHandler(object sender, ImageClickEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ImageClickEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ImageClickEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ImageClickEventArgs)
public delegate void ImageClickEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ImageClickEventArgs ^ e);
type ImageClickEventHandler = delegate of obj * ImageClickEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 作为事件源的服务器控件。

span.span: The server control that is the source of the event.

summary.span: 表示处理在用户单击基于图像的 ASP.NET 服务器控件时引发的所有事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles any events that are raised when a user clicks an image-based ASP.NET server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托定义当用户单击基于图像的 ASP.NET 服务器控件时引发的所有单击事件所需的签名。This delegate defines the required signature for all click events raised when a user clicks an image-based ASP.NET server control. 必须使用定义的任何此委托的签名`OnServerClick`为创建的事件处理程序服务器控件或任何`OnClick`事件处理程序为创建Web 服务器控件。You must use the signature defined by this delegate for any `OnServerClick` event handlers that you create for an server control or any `OnClick` event handlers that you create for an Web server control. 如果您创建的自定义基于图像的 ASP.NET 服务器控件，用户可以单击该，使用此委托来定义与该用户执行任何操作关联的事件。If you create a custom image-based ASP.NET server control that users can click, use this delegate to define the events associated with that user action. 有关委托和事件进行的交互的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about delegates and how they interact with events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 有关如何引发事件的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about how to raise events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI.ImageClickEventArgs Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI.ImageClickEventArgs Sample/CS/imageclickeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI.ImageClickEventArgs Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI.ImageClickEventArgs Sample/VB/imageclickeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
